name: 蔡瑤昇
objective: 這是對於已修過行銷管理相關課程的學生而開的一門課，著重於行銷理論的深入探討，期望對這些對行銷學領域研究有興趣的碩博士班學生，於他們後續的研究有些許的啟發與幫助。
schedule:
第1週  課程介紹及評分方式說明
第2週  (R0) Rajan, V. P., “From the Editor: Reflection on Research and Publishing,” Journal of Marketing, 60(4), Oct, 1996, 3-6.
第3週  (R1) Christian Grönroos, “On defining marketing: finding a new roadmap for marketing, Marketing Theory,” Dec 01, 2006; 6: 395-417.
(C1) John R. Rossiter, “What Is Marketing Knowledge?: Stage I: forms of marketing knowledge,” Marketing Theory , Mar 01, 2001; 1: 9-26.
第4週  (C2) Raymond Hubbard, R. Murray Lindsay, “How the Emphasis on ‘Original’ Empirical Marketing Research Impedes Knowledge Development,” Marketing Theory, Dec 01, 2002; 2: 381-402.
第5週  (R3) Mark Tadajewski, “Remembering motivation research: toward an alternative genealogy of interpretive consumer research,” Marketing Theory, Dec 01, 2006; 6: 429-466.
(C3) Barbara Stern, George M. Zinkhan, Anupam Jaju, “Marketing Images: Construct Definition, Measurement Issues, and Theory Development,” Marketing Theory, Jun 01, 2001; 1: 201-224.
第6週  (R4) Steve Charters, Simone Pettigrew, “Conceptualizing product quality: the case of wine,” Marketing Theory, Dec 01, 2006; 6: 467-483.
第7週 (C4) Hans Kjellberg, Claes-Fredrik Helgesson, “On the nature of markets and their practices, Marketing Theory,” Jun 01, 2007; 7: 137-162
(R5) Raquel Sánchez-Fernández, M. Ángeles Iniesta-Bonillo, “The concept of perceived value: a systematic review of the research,” Marketing Theory , Dec 01, 2007; 7: 427-451.
第8週  期中考
第9週 (C5) Roderick J. Brodie, Mark S. Glynn, Joel van Durme, “Towards a Theory of Marketplace Equity: Integrating Branding and Relationship Thinking with Financial Thinking,” Marketing Theory, Mar 01, 2002; 2: 5-28.
第10週 (R6) Omar Merlo, Bryan A. Lukas and Gregory J. Whitwell, “Heuristics Revisited: Implications for Marketing Research and Practice,” Marketing Theory , 2008; 8: 189-204.
(C6) Berend Wierenga, “On Academic Marketing Knowledge and marketing Knowledge that Marketing managers Use for Decision-Making,” Marketing Theory, Dec 01, 2002; 2: 355-362.
第11週 (C7) Luis Araujo, “Markets, market-making and marketing,” Marketing Theory, Sep 01, 2007; 7: 211-226.
第12週 (C8) Sid Lowe, Adrian N. Carr, Michael Thomas, Lorraine Watkins-Mathys, “The fourth hermeneutic in marketing theory,” Marketing Theory, Jun 01, 2005; 5: 185-203.
第13週 (C9) Alastair Tombs, Janet R. McColl-Kennedy, “Social-Servicescape Conceptual Model,” Marketing Theory, Dec 01, 2003; 3: 447-475.
第14週 (C10) Dawn Burton, “Towards a Critical Multicultural Marketing Theory,” Marketing Theory, Jun 01, 2002; 2: 207-236.
第15週 期末報告及討論
第16週 期末報告及討論
第17週 期末報告及討論
第18週 期末考
